This is not NTR lol. NTR necessarily require you to initially root for the main character (MC), who later got their love interest taken away from them little by little, and that crushing feeling is what defines NTR.

In this series you don’t give a single fuck about the MC’s “best friend”, so you don’t care that his love interests are being stolen from him

You know, I was extremely hopeful. I went into the first few pages thinking "wow, its actually trying to have a bit of plot". Made me think for a second the netorare tag was just for drama or whatever. But no. It had to turn more and more obvious that this was gonna go down the route of the fucker fucking EVERY SINGLE WOMAN around his best friend. I could honestly care less if it turns at least somewhat more realistic later on in that they fight or some shit because we all know damn well who would win anyways. I'd say fuck this author in particular for getting my hopes up but I can't imagine a bigger fuck you than getting your stuff free tl'd. Love this guy's art but I'd rather just scroll through textless pages than be reminded of my spite for the inevitable sequels.
